description: The contracting entity is seeking a supplier to provide a height adjustable office furniture for the Canada School of Public Service. The purchase, delivery and installation of the office furniture is expected to be completed by August 31, 2024.
duration_in_months: MAY be longer than 6 months OR less than 6 months.
tags: Set Aside for Small and Minority Businesses
Office Furniture for Gatineau, Quebec, Canada
full_summary:
# Individual Height Adjustable Work Surface Tender

**Title** - 
English:  "Individual Height Adjustable Work Surface",
French:  "Surface de travail réglable en hauteur individuelle"

**Reference Number** - 
cb-224-57299281

**Contracting Entity** - 
Canada School of Public Service

## Tender Details

* **Public Release Date**: 2024-07-11
* **Tender Closing Date**: 2024-07-22, 14:00:00 Local Time
* **Expected Contract Start Date**: 2024-07-29
* **Expected Contract End Date**: 2024-08-31

## Tender Status
This tender has expired.

## Procurement Information

* **Category**: 56101700 - Office furniture
* **Notice Type**: RFP (Request for Proposal) against Supply Arrangement
* **Method**: Competitive, Selective Tendering
* **Selection Criteria**: Lowest Price

## Notice URL
* No URL available

## Attachments
* [https://canadabuys.canada.ca/sites/default/files/webform/tender_notice/42109/csps-rfb-24cp-0475--qa-en.pdf](https://canadabuys.canada.ca/sites/default/files/webform/tender_notice/42109/csps-rfb-24cp-0475--qa-en.pdf)
* [https://canadabuys.canada.ca/sites/default/files/webform/tender_notice/42109/csps-rfb-24cp-0475-en.pdf](https://canadabuys.canada.ca/sites/default/files/webform/tender_notice/42109/csps-rfb-24cp-0475-en.pdf)

## Bidder Information
For inquiries and submissions:
* Email: csps.solicitation-sollicitation.efpc@canada.ca
* Phone: (343) 550-4215
* Address: 373 Sussex Drive, Ottawa, ON K1N6Z2, Canada

## Tender Description
Canada School of Public Service has a requirement for office furniture to be delivered and installed at their Gatineau, Quebec location by August 31st. This tender is open to suppliers who have a pre-existing Supply Arrangement (SA) or who will qualify for one. A security requirement is associated with this tender, as outlined in the bid solicitation document.

## Important Notes
* This tender is set aside for Indigenous Business only.
* Firms
